author: jmozah
content:
Hi
I am following these steps to run a client
1) Using https://github.com/protolambda/mergenet-tutorial and creating my config for eth1 and eth2.
2) Check out https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/go-ethereum/tree/merge-interop-spec and trying to run the catalyst with this command
```
./build/bin/geth --datadir "./data/catalyst" init "./eth1_config.json"   
./build/bin/geth --datadir "./data/catalyst" --dev --catalyst --http --ws -http.api "engine" console
```

author: jmozah
content:
i am getting this error,  not sure if the eth1_config.json created using the first step is the right way.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: The genesis has no totalTerminalDifficulty specified. I have some instructions here: https://notes.ethereum.org/_UH57VUPRrC-re3ubtmo2w
